    Programme

    Date Time Session Details
    Tuesday 2024-09-10 08:50-09:00 Opening Talk
    09:00-10:00 Invited Azalea Raad
    10:00-10:30 Break
    10:30-12:00 Games I - Regular games with imperfect information are not that regular (L. Doyen, T. Soullard)
    - As Soon as Possible but Rationally (V. Bruyère, C. Grandmont, J. Raskin)
    - Bidding Games with Charging (G. Avni, E. Goharshady, T. Henzinger, K. Mallik)
    - Strategic Dominance: A New Preorder for Nondeterministic Processes (T. Henzinger, N. Mazzocchi, N. Saraç)
    12:00-13:30 Lunch
    13:30-15:00 Infinite State Models - Weighted basic parallel processes and combinatorial enumeration (L. Clemente)
    - Bi-reachability in Petri nets with data (Ł. Kamiński, S. Lasota)
    - Phase-Bounded Broadcast Networks over Topologies of Communication (L. Guillou, A. Sangnier, N. Sznajder)
    - On Continuous Pushdown VASS in one Dimension (S. Rao, G. Pérez)
    15:00-15:30 Break
    15:30-17:00 Rance's Memorial
    Wednesday 2024-09-11 09:00-10:00 Invited Corina Pasareanu
    10:00-10:45 Break
    10:45-12:00 Games II - Faster and Smaller Solutions of Obliging Games (D. Hausmann, N. Piterman)
    - Inapproximability in Weighted Timed Games (Q. Guilmant, J. Ouaknine)
    - The Power of Counting Steps in Quantitative Games (S. Bose, R. Ibsen-Jensen, D. Purser, P. Totzke, P. Vandenhove)
    12:00-13:30 Lunch
    13:30-15:00 Categories and bisimulation - Left-Linear Rewriting in Adhesive Categories (P. Baldan, D. Castelnovo, A. Corradini, F. Gadducci)
    - Behavioural Metrics: Compositionality of the Kantorovich Lifting and an Application to Up-To Techniques (K. D'Angelo, S. Gurke, J. Kirss, B. König, M. Najafi, W. Różowski, P. Wild)
    - A Unifying Categorical View on Nondeterministic Iteration and Tests (S. Goncharov, T. Uustalu)
    - Minimising the Probabilistic Bisimilarity Distance (S. Kiefer, Q. Tang)
    15:00-15:30 Break
    15:30-17:00 Test of time and business meeting
    Thursday 2024-09-12 09:00-10:00 Invited Thomas Wies
    10:00-10:45 Break
    10:45-12:00 Process Algebra - Effect Semantics for Quantum Process Calculi (L. Ceragioli, F. Gadducci, G. Lomurno, G. Tedeschi)
    - Branching Bisimilarity for Processes with Time-outs (G. Reghem, R. J. van Glabbeek)
    - Around Classical and Intuitionistic Linear Processes (J. Jaramillo, D. Frumin, J. Pérez)
    12:00-13:30 Lunch
    13:30-15:00 Automata and Logic I - Invariants for One-Counter Automata with Disequality Tests (D. Chistikov, J. Leroux, H. Sinclair-Banks, N. Waldburger)
    - An automata-based approach for synchronizable mailbox communication (R. Delpy, A. Muscholl, G. Sutre)
    - Nominal Tree Automata With Name Allocation (S. Prucker, L. Schröder)
    - Passive Learning of Regular Data Languages in Polynomial Time and Data (M. Balachander, R. Gentilini, Emmanuel)
    15:00-15:30 Break
    15:30-17:00 Probabilistic - A PSPACE Algorithm for Almost-Sure Rabin Objectives in Multi-Environment MDPs (M. Suilen, M. van der Vegt, S. Junges)
    - Risk-averse optimization of total rewards in Markovian models using deviation measures (C. Baier, J. Piribauer, M. Starke)
    - A Spectrum of Approximate Probabilistic Bisimulations (T. Spork, C. Baier, J. Katoen, J. Piribauer, T. Quatmann)
    - Causally Deterministic Markov Decision Processes (S. Akshay, T. Meggendorfer, P.S. Thiagarajan)
    Friday 2024-09-13 09:00-10:00 Invited Arie Gurfinkel
    10:00-10:30 Break
    10:30-12:00 Automata and Logic II - History-Determinism vs Fair Simulation (Udi Boker, Thomas Henzinger, Karoliina Lehtinen, Aditya Prakash)
    - Reversible Transducers over Infinite Words (Luc Dartois, Loïc Germerie-Guizouarn, Paul Gastin, R. Govind, S. Krishna)
    - Validity of contextual formulas (J. Esparza, R. Rubio)
    - RobTL: Robustness Temporal Logic for CPS (V. Castiglioni, M. Loreti, S. Tini)
    12:00-13:30 Lunch
    13:30-15:00 Model checking - Centralized vs Decentralized Monitors for Hyperproperties (Jana Wagemaker, Luca Aceto, Antonis Achilleos, Elli Anastasiadi, Adrian Francalanza, Daniele Gorla)
    - Automating Memory Model Metatheory with Intersections (A. Koutsouridis, M. Kokologiannakis, V. Vafeiadis)
    - Computing Inductive Invariants of Regular Abstraction Frameworks (V. Krasotin, P. Czerner, J. Esparza, C. Welzel-Mohr)
    - MITL Model Checking via Generalized Timed Automata and a new Liveness Algorithm (S. Akshay, R. Govind, P. Gastin, B. Srivathsan)
    15:00-15:30 Break
    15:30-16:45 Probabilistic - Progress, Justness and Fairness in Modal mu-Calculus Formulae (M. Spronck, B. Luttik, T. Willemse)
    - Fairness and Consensus in Opinion Models (S. Betancourt, F. Valencia, J. Aranda, J. Díaz)
    - Coinductive Techniques for Checking Satisfiability of Generalized Nested Conditions (Lara Stoltenow, Barbara König, Sven Schneider, Andrea Corradini, Leen Lambers, Fernando Orejas)
